Subject: Gate opens for passenger boarding

Subject: Inform Airport CDM Partners of ASBT

Subject: Process triggered by time variable before TOBT
Source Text: This process is triggered by n a time variable <value> minutes before TOBT.

Subject: Check boarding status
Source Text: At a certain time before TOBT (local variable e.g. corresponding to aircraft type) a check shall be performed to check the boarding status.

Subject: Inform of ASBT
Source Text: Inform of Actual Start Boarding Time (ASBT) when it occurs.
